main.speaker: Receptionist
main.text: Oh, you are the potential new manager I've heard about. Our team is lovely to work with. They're all very passionate and interesting people. I have no doubt you will get accepted for the job since there weren't many applicants and two of our previous HR managers are quitting next month.
That sounds very good for me, I guess. Where do I have to be for the interview?

main.speaker: Receptionist
main.text: Oh right, room 156 on the first floor is Mr. Jefferson's office. He should be there waiting for you.
